description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: HTML Injection vulnerability in CE Phoenix v1.0.8.20 and before allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code, escalate privileges, and obtain sensitive information via a crafted payload to the english.php component.

Vulnerabilidad de inyección HTML en CE Phoenix v1.0.8.20 y anteriores permite a un atacante remoto ejecutar código arbitrario, escalar privilegios y obtener información confidencial a través de un payload manipulado para el componente english.php.
